forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.
